News.headline: Peter Richardson Book: Rejected
News.short_description: The author of the book Rejected, Peter Richardson, was on Talk Sport yesterday live on the Hawksbee and Jacobs show.
News.description:
After all the clubs that Peter Richardson had wrote too, he spoke most enthusiastically about Dagenham and Redbridge when he was on the show, which showed the world what a great club we are.

Click here for a link to the podcast where you can listen to Peter on TalkSport talking about the book.

Remember that the books are being sold in the club shop for fans wishing to buy one and can also be bought on our online shop here.

The retail price shown on the book is £7.99 each, we are offering them at a discounted price of £6.99 each. Anyone wishing to buy two copies or more can have them for £6.00 each.
